content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: BatchDeleteAlertConditions path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/monitoring/v2/stacks/{stack_id}/monitors/{monitor_id}/alerts/conditions/batch_delete content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name monitorid
desc a monitor id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum delete multiple alert conditions
reqbody
v2batchdeletealertconditionsrequest
type obj
conditionids
type str
desc the alert condition ids to delete
required true
responses
title: 3_Alert Conditions_BatchDeleteAlertConditions_10.json
